house_listing.house_description: Home sits on a nice corner lot almost 1/2 acres. Clean 2 bedroom home with carpet and linoleum in the kitchen. This is an all electric home with central heat and air ( units was new in 6/99) the washer/dryer, refrigerator, freezer and stove convey with the sale. A covered patio on the rear of the home is accessible through a sliding glass door. Great starter or retirement home. Call Bobby for more details.
